title: Mexico : foreign direct investment ( FDI ) 3rd quarter 2019 , by country
summary: This statistic depicts the leading Mexico direct based on investment FDI from 2014 to 2019 .
In United_States , some 234.7 million pounds of investment were produced in 2019 .
China was the biggest investment producer worldwide in that year .
gold: In the third quarter of 2019 , less than one third of foreign direct investments ( FDI ) in Mexico came from the United States.
During that same period , nearly 27 percent of Mexican FDI originated from Spain.
Moreover , FDI in Mexico throughout the second quarter of each year has decreased lately .
